task: Modify the daily happiness tasks system to allow adding multiple tasks to JSON, each with a unique ID.
comments: This modification involves updating the backend or data structure to support multiple entries in a single JSON file, ensuring each has a distinct identifier.
email_content:
Dear Alex

Please do the following modifications to daily happiness tasks:

1) capable of adding multiple daily happiness tasks to JSON, each with a
unique ID
2) add "Edit", "Delete", button to Daily Diary page and the Flask API

The deadline is by 19:00 August 1st 2025

Best regards
Jesse Huang
